Review.Titre: Your app is user friendly and I love it.
I'm not able to take credit card info
Review.Contenu: I'm not able to take credit card info. I need help fast the keep a client

Review.Titre: Forms were not limiting no of entries…
Review.Contenu: Forms were not limiting no of entries which was discussed via email before even signing up for the paid version of the product. Mail has been sent to support and no response more than a week later. Additionally simple things such as viewing all entries in a single dashboard so that a comprehensive export for a full month for accounting etc is not an option. With the current interface you have to click into each form and export the entries which is time consuming.

Review.Titre: Your forms are good but your management is Bad
Review.Contenu: Your forms are good but your management is very very bad.Any person click on the "Abuse" button you directly stop the form then you make your investigation, That's not how work is done in the real business You must first investigate because after your investigation you opened our form because as you clearly said we DON NOT HAVE ANYTHING INCORRECT and you opened the form after that you again stopped it then you opened it then you stopped it then .....What is that? are we playing? is your business real or you are just playing with your customers?

Review.Titre: It was the only time I tried it
Review.Contenu: I found I got bogged down in creating a simple 1 page form. I did not find the process to work for me as I was not able to complete the form. I abandoned the process. Perhaps I need to hire a professional form-designer? I used to just take this to a printing company with a sketch for offline form design. I had a form I could just copy but was unable to figure out how. Just a few simple fields for people to fill in. You'd think it would be simple to create.

Review.Titre: So many times we get chicken chunks and…
Review.Contenu: So many times we get chicken chunks and there a reheat there tough and not worth eating for $10 also why can’t you get a small side salad with your fish basket when you don’t want the fries and cold slaw They want to charge you more because they can only substitute the fries because they say the cold slaw doesn’t really count as anything yet it’s on your menu for$2.39 and fries are $1.89 and a side salad is $3.09 do the math Grandkids love to stop there after school but we’ve been disappointed to many times Thank you

Review.Titre: The form has little control of…
Review.Contenu: The form has little control of formatting, compressing items Lines between sections and the print out put looks average compared to competitors

Review.Titre: Rules need to be buildable
Review.Contenu: Rules need to be buildable. I shouldn't be able to select this option without first selecting that option.

Review.Titre: I don't like how the link times out…
Review.Contenu: I don't like how the link times out whenever I use it on my social media platform.

Review.Titre: I found the system too difficult to use…
Review.Contenu: I found the system too difficult to use and ended up using Aida Forms.

Review.Titre: Poor user experience, terrible notification emails
Review.Contenu: Building forms and arranging the fields is easy and quite flexible (thanks to sections). And the one diamond in the rough is "Repeating Sections", which paired with payment widgets makes for some great, simple eComm.However, Notifications and Confirmation emails are terrible. We cannot customize the field summary at all, and the overall formatting is horrible. No white-labeling option for emails (unless you are on an expensive plan, and then you can only use branded emails for 2 clients before needed another expensive plan). Styling and formatting the forms is also limited and/or overly complicated.For simple forms, (name, email, comments) it might be okay (as you can hide the ugly summary), but you still have to live with the spammy-looking, Cognito-branded no-reply email.I have a paid plan, but will stick with my other forms provider.

Review.Titre: + I´ve liked the logical expressions.
Review.Contenu: + I´ve liked the logical expressions.- I kann not include a pdf - It will be nice if we can add more buttons for more options

Review.Titre: To me its hard for the person that…
Review.Contenu: To me its hard for the person that recieves the form doesn't have clear instructions on how to send it back

Review.Titre: EXPIRED COGNITO FORMS
Review.Contenu: In my professional opinion I feel like once the form has expired and the work is complete, it should be have the ability for the user to archive or delete.  This would help with efficiency and timing.  Instead of having to scroll through hundreds off past or old or expired requests.

Review.Titre: My experience has been kind of ruff because i never get a chance to speak to miss Jennifer and i have gotten any email about the job to let me know when i could start the job
Review.Contenu: Hello my experience has been kind of ruff lately cause i never got any information about when im am suppose too start the job and the time

Review.Titre: Overall a good product
Review.Contenu: Overall a good product. I like that we have the options to build our form, however when it loads into our database the 10 digit phone number isn't filling in correctly, and I don't see a way to edit that. Some phone numbers have ( ) for area codes, some have - dashes, and others are straight 10 digits. This is and will be an ongoing issue as the majority of the population will use a cellular device for emails, communication, and donation platforms.

Review.Titre: More Payment Option Integrations please
Review.Contenu: Wish you could provide more payment integration options.  A lot of shops in the Philippines use  Cognito Forms but the local payment options such as GCASH (like Venmo) and Paymongo (can be integrated in shopify) can't be linked here. it would make our payment transactions so much faster.

Review.Titre: Missing some key functionality
Review.Contenu: Looks like a nicely polished product. However, is missing some key functionality that is needed for us to replace our Adobe AEM forms, primarily the ability to source data from external APIs. Having to populate another form to reference data is not a viable solution.

Review.Titre: I want to give Cognito more stars &…
Review.Contenu: I want to give Cognito more stars & would be more than happy to speak to someone as to why.First time user- can see how it can be a super helpful tool when linked to payment.I was thankful beyond measure for the youtube tutorials. The cognito product is not intuitive or first-time user-friendly ( imo).Initially because of the challenges/ difficulty in figuring out cognito; I wanted to and almost ended up using google forms!As well when exporting the info: i had columns of info I did not need . And had no idea how to obtain the info I did need.Frustration aside- cognito has a lot of potential. I just wished I could have tap ped into it.

Review.Titre: Cognito is great and I'm still learning…
Review.Contenu: Cognito is great and I'm still learning about it. what I suggest may already be available but it is not obvious to me. Would be great if the calculation function could be added to complicated custom rating scales. for example, we have designed rating scales that provide information on what certain ratings should relate to. each rating scale is it's own question. the calculation function cannot add the scores from the rating scales. Some of the surveys we prepare need to have the questions numbered. it would be great if this could occur automatically and then update the numbering if a question was deleted or hidden.

Review.Titre: This is a great product, but...
Review.Contenu: This is a great product.It will be helpful if you can see for every section/field, where it is link to.This is especially important since any change done to a field creates a discrepancy in the conditioning of the other fields that are condition by the response on the first field.

Review.Titre: So, So
Review.Contenu: I have found the features of JotForm much more user friendly and easier to implement. In my experience, and even after contacting Cognito, it appears there is no undo feature if anything is mistakenly deleted before saving, nor is there a way to add a section or page break between sections already created. I was forced to recreate the entire form to add a section/page break.

Review.Titre: Dear Jennifer,
Review.Contenu: Dear Jennifer,As I am completing the Cognito forms, I am not sure if I am sending this to the job seekers or are we completing in person at deskside.  I put my personal email to see if it send an incomplete forms to me, but I didn't see it.Overall, the format and interactive of the forms are very clear and useful.  BTW, I am not sure how to print the forms afterward for hard copy recordkeeping.I also found the videos are very informative.I am looking forward to seeing the demonstration of the process.Thank you so much.Susan Truong

Review.Titre: Emails confirmations of entries
Review.Contenu: I expected to receive emails when someone filled in a form so I was able to get in contact with them straight away. Not having emails has meant the leads I generated through my form and link, ended up waiting a week or 2 before I realised there were entries.

Review.Titre: Not being able to speak to someone in…
Review.Contenu: Not being able to speak to someone in Customer Service is not helpful.  I'm not a programmer so going back and forth via e-mail is ridiculous, when trying to figure out if what I'm doing is going to work.

Review.Titre: Great presentation, difficult workflow
Review.Contenu: The presentation of the forms both as a link and displayed directly on our website look and respond great. So far the only downfall I have seen is in the workflow section. It could be a little more clear and easier to follow. But with effort it does work as intended.

Review.Titre: Like and dislike
Review.Contenu: Like, easy to useDislike, very slow on page entries, expecially want to delete specific period of entries, wait for loading for hours then timeout.

Review.Titre: I really like the platform
Review.Contenu: I really like the platform. Forms are easy to build and the sections are easy to edit. I do wish that they had more variety for pre-made forms to use for my industry. I hate an account through jot forms and find their pre-made templates are way more extensive. Despite this having the account with cognito is definitely worth it

Review.Titre: I'm a web developer and some of my…
Review.Contenu: I'm a web developer and some of my clients contact form goes to their spam folder. I was told it has to do with the client's shared hosting server. So I chose to use Cognito to resolve this issue. It prevents the forms from going to spam about 95% of the time. I've been on their $10/month plan just to remove their "Powered by Cognito" on the forms on the clients websites. Now they have increased the price up to $15/month (50%). Here in Canada, that's going from paying $13.50/month to $20/month. I don't like when companies use low price to take you in then try to double or triple it in the coming years. I have now found an alternative solution and planning on cancelling their service.

Review.Titre: has many interlinked pages
Review.Contenu: I was looking to build a form that is complex - maybe I don't fully understand what I needed to do, your system was not immediately easy or intuitive for me to navigate to build that form, so after a small attempt I abandoned your service. I thought it felt a bit small, as in the font style and I didn't think I would be able to easily achieve what I wanted

Review.Titre: Good and Bad
Review.Contenu: Creating the form was well designed but being able to get the inputs back in a useable format is a nightmare and even worse…an unanticipated nightmare.

Review.Titre: The site took long to let me log in…
Review.Contenu: The site took long to let me log in andi couldn't log in after that

Review.Titre: It’s fantastic but… I was hoping the…
Review.Contenu: It’s fantastic but… I was hoping the spreadsheet would collate the individual events people had entered, rather than the category/grouping above the individual events..

Review.Titre: So many possibilities, but still want more :)
Review.Contenu: We fell in love with Cognito forms when we first started building forms. All the options and possibilities are extremely useful and it helped us build a very precise and intelligent form. However, there are some inconveniences... We use our forms in a postsecondary institution in order to schedule exam appointements for students who require accommodations. In our form we built a part for the student, a part for (us) internal reviewing of the request and a last part for the professor to provide exam information. The first problem we encountered was the date rule. We wanted request to be sent 7 days prior to the exam date, but had to remove this rule as we could not override it to accomodate exceptions. Also, we nor the professors could fill or modify the form because of the 7 day restriction. It would prevent resubmission if the modifications were applied outside of the 7 day period.The following issue we encountered had to do with forwarding the forms to the professors. At first, we were able to send them a link with a personalised message directly from cognito form (had to copy/paste the text). However, with the changes made following the addition of "workflow", it was no longer possible. We had to generate the link and copy paste it in an email. It didn't look as presentable and was alot more time consuming. In fact, if the email option could be brought back with a possibility to pre-program/automate the message without copy/pasting (while still being able to modify it before sending) that would be perfect. Furthermore, we were hoping to be able to use the different statuses to keep track of the progress of every request/entry. However, it came to our attention that if the status of the entry was changed to anything other than "incomplete", the professors were unable to fil their parts of the form (the link would not work). As a matter of fact, if we could have custom status categories and colors, that would be very interesting.Another thing that would have been useful, is the ability to lock/block the student's portion of the form when sent to the professors in order to avoid them changing any information by mistake. This could be a feature that would be controlled internally before sending the link.Very sorry for the length of this feedback. Those are just a few comments and observations that come to mind. We're still new to this platform, so we might observe more and discover other features as we continue to use this product. All in all, very interesting.

Review.Titre: Lack of Enterprise Functionality.
Review.Contenu: Lack of Enterprise Functionality.Cognito Forms can be a powerful tool due to its simplicity and functionality; however, the lack of enterprise administrative visibility, management, security, and controls really limit the tool's ability to distributed across the enterprise. Our use would significantly increase if there were better centralized management/visibility available.

Review.Titre: It's not very easy to use it and create…
Review.Contenu: It's not very easy to use it and create forms using a smartphone.And this is my only way for now and I am really struggling

Review.Titre: Okay
Review.Contenu: The Templates are very useful.

Review.Titre: Its an OK app to create forms
Review.Contenu: Its an OK app to create form. If you know the exact template that will match your need - it is perfect.However, if you choose a template and then need to make changes to fields like total price it is not flexible enough.For example, I wanted to include a different type of field as a line item in the total, and that it will be multiply by the quantity field - but it was not possible.Also, there is no way to add conditions to the "submit" value.

Review.Titre: Great form, no notification email?
Review.Contenu: Easy to use with lots of options, but I had many submissions without knowing it because I never received a notification email. I had already asked my customers all the information I needed to know because I thought they weren’t submitting  the form

Review.Titre: Nice service.ihope more thinks like…nice thing
Review.Contenu: Nice service.ihope more thinks like bio.AdsInfo.service do

Review.Titre: Need native Salesforce integration.
I like the product
Review.Contenu: I like the product.  Had a couple issues.  Since it’s web-based, it would be great if there were a warning to save if you leave the page. More importantly, it would be great if the coupon feature could be added to any form.  I had to start my form over when I realized that I needed a way to discount.

Review.Titre: Great experience so far
Review.Contenu: Been using this platform for about two months now and so far we have gotten extra 35 submissions. I feel like this is a great form because it’s saving time from having to go back-and-forth on emails.

Review.Titre: extendable menu
Review.Contenu: Love the new update, wondering if we can have the vertical field settings bar (in build a form mode) extendable?  It would be nice to be able to make the view wider so the titles are more visible

Review.Titre: User Forums are Lacking
Review.Contenu: Our nonprofit is using our forms developed with Cognito Forms for most of our main business processes. There are some areas we'd like to streamline but have not found a way to accommodate those requirements. Help articles are fairly high level and don't quite address our concerns. User forums might be a way to address common issues but we haven't seen any such user forums.

Review.Titre: Great overall, reporting needs improvement
Review.Contenu: Great front end to build the form. Amazing user experience who are filling the form. However the reporting of the entries is not good enough.- Unable to share in an easy way to involved organisers who are not tech savvy.- Require better methods to group the information entrred from the guests fields (where user can add multiple guests)I am using it now and will continue for another month, however may not use it due to above limitations.

Review.Titre: Cognito is GREAT!
Review.Contenu: Cognito is GREAT!I did solve the problem at hand, but there are a few things that need work. #1 Invitation to work in the team, cannot be customized. #2 If I need to know who filled out the form, the application has not a built in function to extract that, not even with Zappier, so you have to create a field for it to be filled. The res is excellent.

Review.Titre: Great Product (on paid plans only)
Review.Contenu: The product is great, but only on the paid plans. Free plan has nothing else to offer than a normal form builder (and in my opinion, is even more complicated and offers less design options).Also, would be great if there were more resources and FAQs, although every time I reached out to customer service, they replied super fast and solved my queries.

Review.Pseudo: Jia Ni, CTO and Co-founder at
Review.Titre: Good but could have been great
Review.Contenu: Pros:- very powerful conditional logic, especially the advanced editor. I have not seen it in other places. - Automatically assigning a variable name to an entry is especially handy. Cons:1. The biggest item on my wish list is public API to do CRUD operations on forms and entries. 2. Save & resume does not have an option to redirect to a URL. This makes it impossible to implement a user experience where by clicking save, it takes them to a different page and I don't want the "send me the link" dialog to show up. 3. Have "Save" button on the far right while "next" button on the left hand side just does NOT make UX sense. Almost all my users are confused of that.

Review.Titre: Please integrate Venmo!
Review.Contenu: Please integrate Venmo!! PayPal is becoming outdated, and everyone requests Venmo. We are considering using a different registration  form next year for this reason. If Venmo was added, we would use this form year after year!

Review.Titre: I used Cognito to create a survey
Review.Contenu: I used Cognito to create a survey. I am not a professional computer person and it took me just a little bit of time to figure out how to do it. I would appreciate tutorials on different types of functions Cognito. I'm looking forward to discovering more of what I can do with Cognito. Thanks

Review.Titre: It is so seamless and makes things…
Review.Contenu: It is so seamless and makes things convenient for me, I love it. I would appreciate getting e-mail alerts when someone makes a new entry on the forms, it did the first time but it doesn't anymore.

Review.Titre: Simpler to setup that some other free form tools ...
Review.Contenu: Having created forms in various ways over the years in google forms, microsoft forms and directly in HTML back in the day, I can safely say that Cognito is more straightforward and has great inter-formfield interaction that even a relative novice can use.  My only setup gripe is that "help" text can only be set after a field - be nice to be able to also have this before if desired on a field by field basis (unless I missed something).  I am still waiting to see how it works when users submit forms, but the initial setup looks promising.

Review.Titre: I was able to create the form the way I…
Review.Contenu: I was able to create the form the way I wanted it to work.The only issues I was really finding hard to work with is the Workflow. I would love to see the workflow work like typeforms where you can drag and drop the worflow and add the necessary actions. Would like to see more automated actions in the library.

Review.Titre: Form Design is easy
Review.Contenu: Form Design is easy, yet I am still trying to see how I could use the form for scheduling volunteer hours with my job. I would like to use cognito for scheduling, but I'm only allowed to limit the quantity on certain types of multiple choices.

Review.Titre: Only reason it has not received 5 stars…
Review.Contenu: Only reason it has not received 5 stars is because I will have issues while I’m writing a form once in awhile. I have saved a form when I needed a break and gone back, for some reason it had an error entering. And other times my computer would close due to inactivity and I would have to start all over (that’s when I learned to save the form). Even after saving it I had an issue submitting.

Review.Titre: Easy setup, one suggestion on payment
Review.Contenu: I am extremely happy with the ease of setup of Cognito Forms and the functionality.  My one suggestion for improvement is regarding payment for the upgraded plans.  It would be ideal if Cognito Forms could bill us through accounts payable, a purchase order, or accept a project number to charge things to, instead of using a personal credit/debit card or check.

Review.Titre: My first part of my training was clear…
Review.Contenu: My first part of my training was clear and understandable.  I look forward to learning more about the areas in Cognito that give you fare more options when creating a form.  Everyone kept in contact and asked me how I have been doing; that was good.

Review.Titre: Free does the trick for me!
Review.Contenu: It does make completing forms more organized, of course all the good options are paid subscriptions but at least I can get what I need from the free subscription. It's not fancy, just a form to complete and stay organized.

Review.Titre: too much
Review.Contenu: The forms are clear enough to use but the forms themselves are double work for me. I have to input all the information on the checks and then add more information when I send them in.  Not the best use of time and energy.

Review.Titre: Great for building forms that integrate with systems
Review.Contenu: The platform is terrific. Some of the logic has been tricky but manageable when it's time to do advanced stuff. PowerApps flow integration is mostly painless as well.

Review.Titre: The forms are super helpful
Review.Contenu: The forms are super helpful. The only thing I can think of that would be helpful is if you organize your columns a way you prefer to see that it saves and you do not have to re-filter it every time.

Review.Titre: I really like cognito forms a ton
Review.Contenu: I really like cognito forms a ton, my only complaint is that there is not a lot of templates to use as a starting point. For example, the tax one was only about 30 percent of what I need. I don’t have a ton of free time so I had to commit some serious time to get my forms to what I needed them to be.

Review.Titre: Great Program
Review.Contenu: I love how user friendly this program is. The tutorials online usually cover all my questions, but when they don't the staff is very prompt in responding to my inquiries.

Review.Titre: To develop the forms were very easy
Review.Contenu: To develop the forms were very easy. Although when I transferred the forms to a program Prezio, the forms were not interactive. Which that would of been wonderful. I was new to both programs. Thank you for suppling a start for the project for my classwork.

Review.Titre: Freedom to build, export needs improvement
Review.Contenu: I really enjoy the freedom to build my form the way it makes sense for me and my users. Once you learn the platform, it's very user friendly and easy to adapt to my needs. I would like if the export feature was a little more user friendly for all of my options. It will export some fields but not others and I was really hoping for better use of this to use in Excel. Overall, very happy with the site.

Review.Titre: The only thing that makes Cognito not 5…
Review.Contenu: The only thing that makes Cignito not 5 stars is the UI for making the forms is better on Jotforms.  But the functionality blows Jotforms away.

Review.Titre: New feature development
Review.Contenu: I really like the features that cognito forms offers, there is only one feature that I am missing and it´s development I like to see in the near future: flexible filling of the forms when shared with a different user. Meaning that when I sent out a form, instead of the only available option, to fill out the form immidiatly, the user could also see all questions and go back to them at a later time to fill out the missing gaps.

Review.Titre: Tool is easy to use
Review.Contenu: Tool is easy to use, forms are nice. Only issue is maybe the multingual support for a single form. we should be able to write a single form in different languages.

Review.Titre: Web forms
Review.Contenu: Very user friendly and easy to use.  Lots of great features to play around with to make more accommodating.  I love not having to wait on paper copies anymore!

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms, Pretty Good
Review.Contenu: Cognito Forms is very helpful and easy to use. The drag and drop functions are really user friendly, and the choices of boxes are just right. The only thing that would make this 5 stars is if the response boxes were larger. My clients said this was their only complaint with the questionnaires.

Review.Titre: Thanks
Review.Contenu: Hi!You have a wonderful service!But it is a little bit difficult to understand at first, it's not as user friendly as I tought at first.Since your new update, I was not able to change the email send to our client, and the clients was not able to have access to our forms. Is it normal? I'm sorry for my english, it's not my first language. Have nice day and keep up the good work!

Review.Titre: Forms are a little confusing until you…
Review.Contenu: Forms are a little confusing until you get the hang of it, but overall, user friendly.

Review.Titre: Flexible product & Good support
Review.Contenu: In addition to a very flexible product, I always get a response from support within 24 hours.

Review.Titre: It was easy to build my first form
Review.Contenu: It was easy to build my first form, the user interface is easy to understand and I got used to it quickly. I used the form code in HTML, sounded like fun :)

Review.Titre: Cognito review
Review.Contenu: The cognito forms are very easy. Amazingly so even attaching your documents is easy.

Review.Titre: My experience it's very good and know…
Review.Contenu: My experience it's very good and know everything about the job

Review.Titre: Well done Cognito forms
Review.Contenu: Well done Cognito forms, you've developed pretty good forms, keep on!

Review.Titre: Love cognito but I have my days where…
Review.Contenu: Love cognito but I have my days where it frustrates me

Review.Titre: USED ONE TIME
Review.Contenu: USED ONE TIME, IT SEEMS TO BE EASY TO NAVIGATE.

Review.Titre: So helpful.
Follow up information
Review.Contenu: I do like the set up and the ease of having my clients upload their forms however I have had one complaint from the clients and it’s the same if they forget something and they need to go back into the link they have to start all over they can’t go back to where they start it from and enter new information that’s the downside

Review.Titre: I have apps that manage my invoices…
Review.Contenu: I have apps that manage my invoices that I would like to use for cognito forms too. Those apps usually are specialized to process import datea in certain formats. Like from the online-shop at my jimdo homepage-shop. Do you think it is possible to export the Data from cognito forms so that they match other popular shop Data formats like the jimdo shop or shopify data format? At the moment I unfortunately have to convert the data format manually for the import. Best wishes,Tobias

Review.Titre: Pros & Cons
Review.Contenu: PROSEasy to use - easy to learnBetter in terms of flexibitliy than google forms (example the ability to set answer limits per choice for each question)Clear interface and friendly enough to the userCONSLacks statistical and easy representation of collected responsesNo options to customise fonts, add images or other cosmetic choicesOPINIONCognito has much room to develop, it is reliable, not the best tool to present fancy surveys but highly flexible and reliable, more than other similar tools. So it is a YES for using it for business purposes.

Review.Titre: It was a bit confusing using Cognito…
Review.Contenu: It was a bit confusing using Cognito forms the very first time...it took me quite a while to learn how to create different kinds of forms. It would be nicee if there was a tutorial or better guidance. Especially on how to allow more people to view entries for a form.

Review.Titre: I was a lotus 123 fan back in the day…
Review.Contenu: I was a lotus 123 fan back in the day this works well and to my mind is easier than excel. A few issues working with  a small mobile screen but with that said a tablet or laptop should have no problems as far as I can see at present

Review.Titre: Hi Jennifer,
Review.Contenu: Hi Jennifer,The form is found user friendly. I have found the following little trouble1.	The font can be bold, underlined or italicized2.	After submitting the writings, the link sent back to me is not functioning. b.rgdsDantes

Review.Titre: Great
Review.Contenu: Great! I enjoy using your forms. Few features though but can't remember right now I had rather you have but If only your premium is cheaper or with quite affordable options for low income users, I would pay. Well done!

Review.Titre: I wanted a form to add to my website to… Capture Client in-depth data
Review.Contenu: I wanted a form to add to my website to replace a home visit and fact find for a Clients Will and Estate planning.Starting with a simple name address capture and now have moved on to questions that use many features of the free package that I have. I did move up to the next level as I wanted clients to be able to save and return as well. A few teething problems down to me learning about formulas and conditional questions, but all sorted now.I highly recommend starting with the free version and see if that will do. My only gripe is it is a bit "stale" to look at especially if you want the fonts/colours to match the site. It does go a long way towards it, but it definitely looks like an outside add on.The capture and notification of data received is also really good. The only other reason I moved to a higher package is the cross-referring of data from one form to another to save clients reentering things twice,but I have yet to play with that.

Review.Titre: Intelligently designed forms..
Review.Contenu: Intelligently designed forms... I am truly satisfied.

Review.Titre: Dashboard could look better
Review.Contenu: Dashboard could look better. Functionality and code seems well built.

Review.Contenu: I find it very easy to follow and simple enough for our claimants.

Thanks

Review.Titre: You guys rock
Review.Contenu: You guys rock. I will recommend you anytime any day

Review.Titre: Excellent app
Great product
Nice Experience
Good 👍☺️
LOVE CogitoForms
Review.Contenu: LOVE CogitoForms! Small business owner here, found this company, and literally was able to do EVERYTHING I NEEDED! Intake forms? Document signing? Contracts? Order forms? ALL INCLUDED! I've mentioned this company to a few fellow SBO and friends, waiting for them to sign up (AND they offer a GREAT referral bonus that benefits BOTH parties!)

Review.Titre: Robust, flexible and easy to use
Review.Contenu: Their pricing has made it easy for me to use the forms to help get early feedback for a free lead magnet I'm developing, before it is launched along side a new venture. Their supportive staff and great range of features have helped me to track key insights, and embed their forms on my website despite other providers not being able to get their embed option to work effectively.Their premium offerings also make it easy for me to see how I can scale up my activities, with nuanced and advanced features that will help to engage my customers after the official launch.Robust, flexible and easy to use. They also have good options for using conditional logic both at the free and paid levels.

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms are very easy to use
Review.Contenu: Cognito Forms are very easy to use, and the price is good compared to others, although I am using the free version for now as I build my site`s traction I will upgrade in time, great service.Thanks.Gus

Review.Titre: Profesional looking forms and very easy…
Review.Contenu: Profesional looking forms and very easy to customize to your liking

Review.Titre: Super easy to make the forms I needed…
Review.Contenu: Super easy to make the forms I needed and embed them in our website without any deep technical knowledge.Looking great with tons of features for every need.

Review.Titre: This form is so use friendly to us
Review.Contenu: This form is so use friendly to us. It help to minimize my  daily work load. It update my record update easily

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms is Awesome!
Review.Contenu: Cognito Forms is Awesome! It is easily one of the best-designed and user-friendly interfaces I have ever used. I have used a competitor's software for a number of years and after one brief tutorial with Cognito Forms, I was up and running. All the tools are easily and logically accessible. It really is a pleasure to use, and very intuitive. You guys deserve a big pat on the back! I am not affiliated with Cognito Forms and rarely write reviews but this app deserves to win awards because it's that good!

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms makes it so easy!
Review.Contenu: Cognito Forms makes it so easy to develop contracts, surveys, or any kind of informational form. I've only been working with the program for a couple of months, but I'm really impressed.

Review.Titre: The forms are very easy to create
Review.Contenu: The forms are very easy to create, especially when you use the templates. I also loved the fact that the notification email when someone fills the order form is automatic. I did not have to configure anything to get this.This feature is very important as I can keep track of any new submission.

Review.Titre: I really like Cognito Forms for my magazine!
Review.Contenu: I really like Cognito Forms!I use the free version and it works great for me! I run a magazine publication and we feature work by contributors from all around the world. Potential contributors are able to easily submit their work to my Cognito Form for me to review; it's much easier than receiving submissions in my email inbox, which is what I used to do!

Review.Titre: First time user... great experience!
Review.Contenu: This is my first time creating a survey with Cognito. The site is very easy to use, has more options than I anticipated, and I haven't run into any issues that have hindered my abilities to evaluate the results of my survey. I will definitely be using it again and look forward to making even more complex surveys in the future!

Review.Titre: We are new to Cognito Forms and are now…
Review.Contenu: We are new to Cognito Forms and are now changing all our forms over. Thank you Cognito Forms! This is a great platform with professional design outcomes and very easy to use. Recommend 100%.

Review.Titre: Easy to Use
Review.Contenu: I'm very impressed with the ease of sharing forms between staff using this app.  We not only work remotely, we work in different states.  But Cognito makes it easy for us to compare information on spreadsheets without issue.

Review.Titre: Easy Forms
Review.Contenu: Hi Jennifer,  While not a big user of the Online Form, I have to say how simple it is to create a good looking form. Very easy to modify and the export option to receive an Excel file makes it easy to keep track of respondents to the form. Thank you Cognito Forms for providing this option for an online form (RSVP).  Regards Alan Carter

Review.Titre: Great platform to create your own…
Review.Contenu: Great platform to create your own full-featured forms. You have all the tools you need to create any kind of form: you can use javascript, send webhooks, create actions... The downside is that your tech and design departments must be involved as the basic forms are too basic by default (basic design, few functionalities...). What we like the most is that we can add any functionality, validation, design... that we need. We could not find any form in the market that provided us with this wide range of capabilites to edit our forms.

Review.Titre: Quick & Easy Forms, 10/10
Review.Contenu: The forms are easy & quick. Even the free version is so good. I believe the paid version will be delightful. Highly recommended!

Review.Titre: Easy to Learn, Easy to Use & Easy to Create!
Review.Contenu: I absolutely LOVE Cognito Forms! I tried using Jot Forms to create my Client Review Survey, but the interface was SO cumbersome. So I googled and was thrilled to find your form designer! I love that it doesn't take long to learn how to use Cognito Forms. I was able to easily create my Client Review Survey and get it embedded onto my website page.  I will recommend your site and service to my clients too!

Review.Titre: This is a front office must-have
Review.Contenu: This is a front office must-have! I have been able to recreate paper forms as digital within minutes. The form links make it so easy to send to email groups. And once the data has been entered and submitted by user, there is no additional "data entry" that is required. It's all in researchable format. Good stuff!

Review.Titre: Simple, easy to use, professional, time saver!
Review.Contenu: I run a 'by appointment' small business and need to get my clients to complete a client registration form. I am not very tech savvy and I found cognito forms through my partnered square appointments booking app. I have been extremely impressed at how easy it was to create a simple form and now send it in advance to all my new clients to complete before their first appointment. It has simplified my life and customers also find it efficient and professional. Thank you so much cognito forms!

Review.Titre: Excellent WordPress Forms Builder
Review.Contenu: I wanted a WordPress forms builder so that I could accept card payments and found Cognito to be perfect. Quite easy to get started and, even though I was on the free version, I got help from the support people when I ran into difficulties - it was soon sorted.Very happy with the final result and the way it works.

Review.Titre: Fortnite Creator using Cognito Forms
Review.Contenu: My name is xVonKlutch and I’m a Content Creator/Epic Partner on Fortnite. I manage over 20 games on a daily basis, and keeping on top of players trying to report bugs with nowhere specific to report them to was proving a challenge. I found Cognito Forms online and have not looked back since! My Players can now report bugs quickly and efficiently and all in one place! The form itself was simple and easy to setup and was ready and online within minutes! Highly Recommend!

Review.Titre: Easy to use and very intuitive
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and very intuitive. Has a lot of features and exporting the data is quite easy as well. I have been using Cognito Forms for a couple of years now and still like it !

Review.Titre: Overheating with Seamless
Review.Contenu: Everthing's nearly perfect. It's very easy to build forms and handle the data management without guildance or support.One thing can be improved is the time duration needed for loading the blank form to display on a web page using the Seamless embed code.  It would be perfect if the flywheel just appears less than a quater of a second while loading.  Comparetively, the Iframe embed code works much faster.From my experience,  when Seamless works with a webpage built by the Godaddy's Website Builder, my desktop PC would abnormally heat up to a high temperature. The overheating happens during website building and/or browsing that webpage on any Windows desktop. Iframe does not have the same problem.

Review.Titre: CognitoForms is great!
Review.Contenu: CognitoForms is great for any business that needs multiple or various types of forms, checklists and more. Everything is fully customizable and being able to add varying content based upon user input. Some experience or practice is needed to use CognitoForms but once you have the hang of it, it’s great!

Review.Titre: I was able to create a HOA survey…
Review.Contenu: I was able to create a HOA survey quickly, although it was a test, the results were easily collected. I’m sure the H OA management will use in the future.  I have used another product in the past fot another organization, but I was impressed by the ability to create a form so quickly.

Review.Titre: It's very user friendly.
Review.Contenu: It's very user friendly.I had no problem using it without out instructions.

Review.Titre: We knew what we were missing - a form that really worked!
Review.Contenu: I was recruited to be a website coordinator for a regional art club.  Google forms had been letting the group down, off and on, for months.  We relied on that form to immediately inform us of new members, their contact and artistic information and their dues.  As we grew tired of creating a "work-around", I started to look other places. My personal IT tech suggested trying another forms supplier, specifically Cognito Forms.  In less that 20 minutes, he remotely had it set up for me, and before the day was over, it was seamlessly sending up-to-date member submissions to all who need them.  Not looking back to google for help, again!!

Review.Titre: We recently used Cognito Forms to help…
Review.Contenu: We recently used Cognito Forms to help screen applicants for cat rescue adoption. The form set up process was very intuitive. The process of sharing the link with applicants and subsequent screening was very easy. Thanks to Cognito Forms we feel more confident that our wonderful rescue cats and kittens are getting loving homes they deserve.

Review.Titre: hey thereextremely versatile, dependable, and just well-thought
Review.Contenu: hey there!  I really love Cognito- we've used it in our business for about 6 years and it's been extremely versatile, dependable, and just well-thought in general.   I appreciate Cognito so much and am grateful it exists!

Review.Titre: I LOVE COGINTO!
Review.Contenu: I love the capabilities of Cognito and the support is AMAZING!  I do wish some of your help pages and videos were a little more in-depth and/or easy to search so I don't always have to ask for help (I like to figure things out on my own, ha ha).  Can't wait to keep learning more about what Cognito can do!

Review.Titre: Excellent tool
Review.Contenu: It is very easy to create forms, the tools are easy to use, without having experience, in a few minutes you can create any type of form. Your design is professional and nice.Improvement: When exporting the form to Excel, the numbers are converted to text

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms continues to impress me…
Review.Contenu: Cognito Forms continues to impress me with new features that I can use Enterprise-wide, such as tracking which authenticated user made changes to a form.From a County Government perspective, Cognito Forms has allowed us to generate a variety from simple to complex forms quickly.  The filter, sort, and download as an Excel file features, as well as populating a pdf file for a very clean finished form, has given us the flexibility that departments need to work with the form data.Keep it us Cognito Forms!

Review.Titre: I use to use JotForm.....
Review.Contenu: I use to use JotForm also a good platform for forms.  How ever with Cognito even with the free tier you get some fantastic features, multiple fields on one row, view/hide depending on responses, calculations and more. *****

Review.Titre: We had some dilemmas at first
Review.Contenu: We had some dilemmas at first, due to older operating systems at our client end there were some glitches, but the Cognito customer support was excellent. We're keeping this element on our website! Five Stars all the way.

Review.Titre: Simple Form Solutions
Review.Contenu: I was looking for an online form platform that would simply work and we could point people to off our website.  Cognito fit the bill!  Simple to use, templates that work and the ability to change categories, add graphics etc.  A little learning curve but overall, great!

Review.Titre: We’ve found so many great ways to…
Review.Contenu: We’ve found so many great ways to utilize cognito forms throughout our company. I have minimal feedback for improvement, which may not sound like it but that is a positive statement.

Review.Titre: My nonprofit just discovered and fell…
Review.Contenu: My nonprofit just discovered and fell in love with Cognito Forms. We are planning a larger international conference in Kenya, and we were looking for a cost effective way to manage registrations with conditional response options, manage payments in multiple currencies, and be user friendly for my staff. We found our answer with Cognito Forms, along with a responsive help team. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Gem!
Review.Contenu: Cognito is a real gem amongst the many form developing platforms. It has a no-nonsense approach and is truly backed by a great team who were very happy to help us along the way. I really have had a great time finding building forms on Cognito and really grateful to all those who patiently answered my queries. Such a neat platform!

Review.Titre: I've tried many online form generators
Review.Contenu: I've tried many online form generators. Including Wufoo, Cognito is the best! I had the paid verion but someone else manages that website now. I now have the free version for my own use AND to try to show others how to use Cognito.I especially like the service that I've received and the fact that Cognito knows a lot about databases. I like these people and highly recommend the product.

Review.Titre: Powerful and easy to use, great support
Review.Contenu: The forms are powerful and easy to use. When I've had questions about a complex workflow, support has been very responsive and found great answers. I've used a few other form builders, Cognito has been the most user friendly so far.

Review.Titre: Best Form Builder You'll Find
Review.Contenu: We've been using Cognito Forms for years now and its easy-to-use interface is the best! We've used a couple of competitors and honestly, none of them compare. I highly recommend Cognito Forms for any level of experience.Their documentation on how to create the type of form you need is phenomenal as well!

Review.Titre: Exactly what I was looking for
Review.Contenu: Exactly what I was looking for! Let's me create easy forms that are branded. Thanks

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms is amazing
Review.Contenu: Cognito Forms is amazing! So simple to create any form I need, post links or QR codes and easily find the list of registrants. I highly recommend this service!

Review.Titre: Mighty Darn Useful!
Review.Contenu: There are any number of form-making tools/software out in the ether. I have used several and found that Cognito Forms has features most of the others do not and is adaptable to just about anything you might think of. I collaborated on a nurses union website to create a form for both officers and contract voting purposes via the site. The access had to be protected with a username and password which was accomplished through the sites software program, but the form had to allow only one vote entry and then block further attempts to skew the votes total count. Cognito allowed me to do this and that made the owner of the site and chief negotiator very happy!

Review.Titre: It was very good
Review.Contenu: It was very good; we are planning to implement use this platform to share information among our company. we shall contact you for yearly basis agreement.

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms and Power Automate
Review.Contenu: With Cognito Forms and the help of Power Automate, I was able to fully automate all of my company's submission processes. I've been able to turn 8hr workloads into 2. It has been the perfect solution for both internal and external use!

Review.Titre: I am so glad I found this company
Review.Contenu: I am so glad I found this company.  I was using another service for 7 years and spending way more money on it.  Cognito Forms is better and does everything I want.  My bookings are a bit complicated, but Cognito Forms works perfectly for everything I want.  I emailed their customer service a few times for help, and they were quick to respond and help me.  The system took me some time to learn, but much less time than from other companies.  I don't know why everyone doesn't use this company.

Review.Titre: Freelancing ain't easy, but Cognito Forms is!
Review.Contenu: As a freelance ID, I constantly shift and acclimate to new digital tools the client requires me to use. Cognito Forms was simple to understand, and absolutely loved the ease of creating customized forms. The team really thought of the full experience for the user.

Review.Titre: Found the functionality I needed
Review.Contenu: I tried several websites offering forms and only Cognito Forms had the functionality I needed for my survey. My form looks fantastic, so simple to create, it gives instant feedback to my clients after using it, and I can easily integrate it into my website. Thanks so much Cognito Forms!

Review.Titre: New to Cognito Forms
Review.Contenu: New to Cognito Forms, on the $15 plan. We are using Cognito Forms for a new Community Event. There was a learning curve but once I created one form, I was a pro! Cognito Forms had everything we were looking for: signatures, online payments, and doc uploads. We could also charge the payee the extra cc fees. Of course, we give an option to mail a check. With us being a non-profit, the price was great and worth it for everything to be online. I plan to use this software for volunteer sign-up closer to time of the event.

Review.Titre: The only free services with computation
Review.Contenu: It's the only free services for youth movements which offer so many options like calculation, intuitive formule for computing or condition.It also offer the possibility to send result by mail.The theme is nice too.

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms is a Godsend.
Review.Contenu: Awesome free product, no strings. Cognito Forms is intuitive, free, and powerful. Most features are open for all users to use (including common tools that are price-locked by other forms solutions). This includes sending emails to those who completed the form, reminders to yourself, customising the form, loads of submissions (I have no idea what the limit is, but I haven't hit it after heavy usage). I've never had to contact support (the product is that good) so I tried to come up with a bogus issue. Staff were quick to respond and helped me fix my 'task'. ( I wish I could gatekeep this product, but it is simply outstanding and I always rave on about it when making forms. Crazy, eh?I love it. You will love it. Use it now!!

Review.Titre: Great for work and play!
Review.Contenu: Cognito forms has been wonderful to use. It’s extremely helpful as it prompts you for information you may have missed, and gives you a lot of options to customize.

Review.Titre: Overall we think the program is great
Review.Contenu: Overall we think the program is great! There are a few tweaks that could make it better though. When creating a PDF copy of a form's responses we would love to see the images that were attached. The use of the multi-data table is what drew us to this program initially. This tool is exactly what we needed!

Review.Titre: I just finished my first floor plan
Review.Contenu: I just finished my first floor plan, and I can’t believe how easy it was to submit and how accurate they are. I wasn’t sure what to expect, but the plans came back in less than 24 hours and look amazing. I’ll be using for every listing from now on.

Review.Titre: A single survey solution
Review.Contenu: I have used so many online survey tools that I can't count. Cognito forms is simple, powerful (send the form, send a link) and end users like it.  It collects responses internally and a xls download makes things easy.

Review.Titre: I’m new to Cognito and not too tech…
Review.Contenu: I’m new to Cognito and not too tech savvy but I found it very easy to manoeuvre around and create just what I needed.

Review.Titre: Very convenient solution
Review.Contenu: Very convenient solution. I used to create my own forms and submit it to my customers. And the solution was every time very successful. By the way, it’s very easy to embed it in my WordPress website !

Review.Titre: Cognito form is by far the cheapest
Review.Contenu: Cognito form is by far the most affordable form site ever. The style may be limited but it looks professional enough.Thank you for ever existing!

Review.Titre: Works great for my needs as a travel…
Review.Contenu: Works great for my needs as a travel concierge. I was able to create my own forms for my needs and specifications with the wording how I wanted it. And to be able to use that form, share it, and the form return in the "mailbox" on the site makes it that much better and fits my needs very well.

Review.Titre: I'm a travel agent and recently signed…
Review.Contenu: I'm a travel agent and recently signed up to Cognito Forms to create forms for my clients.  I have had nothing but great feedback from my clients and I am very satisfied with how they turned out.  I highly recommend!

Review.Titre: I absolutely love Cognito Forms
Review.Contenu: I absolutely love Cognito Forms.  I use to for taking bookings for my business.  I have hundreds of different types of bookings, and Cognito Forms is perfect for all of them.  I used to you a different booking system, but now I exclusively use this.  Like anything, there is a slight learning curve for the first day, but with the help of their staff, I managed to figure out everything I needed.  I can even use these forms to support gift vouchers.  When I want to make new forms, I simply copy an old form and make minor changes to it.  The layout is nice as well.  Customers are much more satisfied with this system.  The price is also much cheaper than other companies.  This is has been a lifesaver for my business.  I just wish I had found this company a few years ago.

Review.Titre: Cognito Forms has been extremely…
Review.Contenu: Cognito Forms has been extremely helpful to gaining valuable and reliable information from customers at the organization that I work at. It is easy to use and appealing to all parties, those filling in the forms and those creating it. When I had a question about the forms a kind employee helped me solve my problem immediately.

Review.Contenu: Very powerful database package. But why ask me for my opinion on making forms, I am only an editor of the database, I am not admin and therefore do not create forms.

Review.Titre: Very happy
Review.Contenu: I trialed many other form clients, however they either couldn't do the conditional calculations, repeating sections, or a few other crucial things I needed to make my life easier.Not only was the software easy to use, but the styling options meant it fits seamlessly into our website.

Review.Contenu: Easy to use, nice interface, wide choices.Made easier to get and manage event registrations.I use it for some time, great value for money.

Review.Contenu: The features available on this form builder are amazing and it all works in sync. I will be sticking with Cognito Forms for all my form and workflow needs in the future!

Review.Titre: Great form making system!
Review.Contenu: Great form making system! Very intuitive layout and building capability with powerful tools, and extremely responsive support team when needed. Value is unmatched amongst any competitors, and integration of our forms into Shopify has been stellar!

Review.Titre: Yes and again yes!
Review.Contenu: I love the ease of use that that is platform provides. The forms are easy to create and are highly customizable. I would love to do more business with Cognito Forms in the neat future.

Review.Titre: Great intelligent form builder
Review.Contenu: Great intelligent form builder. Fully featured and does good work!

Review.Titre: Cognito forms is amazing for agreements
Review.Contenu: Cognito forms is amazing for preparing my shooting agreements. So convenient and easy to work with! I recommend it 100% Thank you !

Review.Titre: Most powerful form in the world
Review.Contenu: I can do everything with this form. I actually used it to become the UI for a sales automation platform I've recently built.

Review.Titre: Needs to be more.modern
Review.Contenu: Functionality is really good, but the website and forms are dated. Would be great if they looked more.modern and up to date with competitions.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and to the point
Review.Contenu: Easy to use, to the point, accessible and I look forward to developing new ideas and using cognito forms as I move on ahead.

Review.Titre: I am very pleased with the product and…
Review.Contenu: I am very pleased with the product and even at the basic level it gave me far more than I expected. I thoroughly recommend Cognito.

Review.Titre: It’s very easy for the people to get…
Review.Contenu: It’s very easy for the people to get the link and pay plus I get all the information that I need

Review.Titre: Set up forms
Review.Contenu: I have set up the forms ready to be used at the beginning of 2023 for our coming show. They look really good and we are looking forward to using them

Review.Titre: The process was very easy to do
Review.Contenu: The process was very easy to do. No problems and simplified.

Review.Pseudo: Andrew Read director of a CIC
Review.Titre: Great for landing pages & newsletters
Review.Contenu: Very useful and user-friendly tool to use on, for example, landing pages to gather people's details for email newsletters.
